definitions.title: n.pr.loc.
definitions.body: in S. Judah (connex. with above √ dub.);—Am 1:1, Je 6:1, 2Ch 11:6, as ‘ son ’ of Ashḥur 1Ch 2:24 1Ch 4:5; [[תְּק֫וֹעָה]] 2Sa 14:2; ´[[מִדְבַּר ת]]: 2Ch 20:20; LXX Qekwe (also -oue); mod. Tekû’a, c. 5 m. S. of Bethlehem; v. Rob:BR i.486f. Buhl:G 157 f. Taylor:Hast. DB TEKOA GASm:Twelve Proph. i.74 f. Dr:Am 1, 1.
